revised_title: An In-depth Study of Stomach Types in Bivalvia
tldr: This article examines the stomach structures and types in Bivalvia, a class of mollusks. It identifies and describes five stomach types, their features, and their evolutionary implications. The study also discusses the relationships between different bivalve families based on their stomach structures and the possibility of further taxonomic classifications.
